synopsis.text: Pokémon-only park, Pokémon Plaza, promises Ash, his friends, and their Pokémon a day of fun and relaxation. As they let their Pokémon loose to enjoy the summer retreat, Ash entrusts Pikachu with the responsibility of watching over Togepi. However, their peaceful vacation takes an unexpected turn when Pikachu and friends cross paths with a rambunctious group led by a Raichu. The squabble that ensues not only disturbs Togepi's rest but also threatens to disrupt the tranquility of their vacation. Will Ash and his friends be able to restore order and salvage their day of leisure? Join them on their adventure to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
